tool_description: The "COVID-19 - Greece" is an API that allows to retrieve data related to COVID-19 in Greece.
title: COVID-19 - Greece

api_list.name: All Data
api_list.description: Access to all data including daily cases, deaths, tubed cases, age and gender distribution.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-greece.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-greece.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
